skills.skill: DoD IT and Cloud Security Policies

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and test new boundary security capabilities in a lab environment and implement newly tested boundary security capabilities into production environments.
Support implementation teams with remote network firewall and security appliance support.
Identify and support security requirements for switched and routed networks and implement network security best practice configuration and associated hardware and software.
Discover and assess complex client enterprise network deployments.
Apply leading-edge security principles, theories, and concepts and contribute to the development of new principles and concepts.
Operate with substantial latitude for unreviewed action or decision and mentor or supervise employees in both firm and technical competencies.
Oversee efforts to help customers overcome their most difficult challenges by integrating secure practices while implementing global secure communications.
Identify new opportunities to use cybersecurity solutions to help customers meet their toughest challenges.
Support customers in integrating secure practices and implementing global secure communications.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
